fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks, Climate Action
inter_groups: meetings and discussions with our elected MEP's , Keeping them up to date with events as they happen in commission , and liase with them on parliamentary activity that relates to PCI infrastructural funding voting . =
eu_initiatives: eu energy policy & environmental law, and how it is interpted and enacted in member states. We attend and contribute to the pci selection process within commission,We also actively engage with our elected representatives in the EU parliament, and regularily meet with our MEP's.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Keeping an eye on EU/National energy policy and its affects on communities , and trying to present viewpoints from a 'citizen' viewpoint, rather than vested interest.
